description:
A childhood friend tells Huey of a schoolteacher whose students have become knowledgeable beyond measure. Later, two suspicious men come to the Disward manor in search of a valuable book.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Book of Wisdom / Queen of the Night
Le livre de la sagesse / Reine de la nuit
Livro Da Sabedoria! - Rainha Da Noite!
叡智の書 / 月下美人
